Uses of Class
io.atomix.protocols.raft.RaftProtocolConfig

  • Packages that use RaftProtocolConfig 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.protocols.raft
    Provides classes and interfaces for managing Raft clients and servers.

    • Uses of RaftProtocolConfig in io.atomix.protocols.raft

      Methods in io.atomix.protocols.raft that return RaftProtocolConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RaftProtocolConfig RaftProtocolConfig.setCommunicationStrategy(CommunicationStrategy communicationStrategy)
      Sets the client communication strategy.
      RaftProtocolConfig RaftProtocolConfig.setExecutor(Executor executor)
      Sets the executor.
      RaftProtocolConfig RaftProtocolConfig.setMaxRetries(int maxRetries)
      Sets the maximum allowed number of retries.
      RaftProtocolConfig RaftProtocolConfig.setMaxTimeout(Duration maxTimeout)
      Sets the maximum session timeout.
      RaftProtocolConfig RaftProtocolConfig.setMinTimeout(Duration minTimeout)
      Sets the minimum session timeout.
      RaftProtocolConfig RaftProtocolConfig.setReadConsistency(ReadConsistency readConsistency)
      Sets the read consistency level.
      RaftProtocolConfig RaftProtocolConfig.setRecoveryStrategy(Recovery recoveryStrategy)
      Sets the client recovery strategy.
      RaftProtocolConfig RaftProtocolConfig.setRetryDelay(Duration retryDelay)
      Sets the retry delay.
      RaftProtocolConfig RaftProtocolConfig.setRetryDelayMillis(long retryDelayMillis)
      Sets the retry delay.
